name: Ch.7BaseConvo4
_source: speak;Joshua;Hm?|Who are you two?|Why are you staring at me?
speak;Franz;I am Franz!|A knight of Renais!
speak;Ross;I'm Ross, son of General Garcia of Ide!
speak;Joshua;I see...|Those are big titles for such young kids...
speak;Ross;We aren't kids!|We fought with you on the battlefield too, you know!
speak;Joshua;Hmmm...|Now that I think of it, I do think I remember seeing you two fighting as well...
speak;Franz;Yeah!|We saw you fighting, too, and you looked so cool with your swordmanship!
speak;Joshua;Oh, that? Please, I didn't even break a sweat!|Dare I say, it was almost getting boring.
speak;Ross;Wow!|That's so cool!|I hope I get that confident one day!|What's your secret, mister?
speak;Joshua;Now, hold on. I'm not giving my secrets away for free.|Hmm... perhaps, if we made a wager...|Either of you got any coin?
speak;Franz;Coin?|I think I've got some savings...
speak;Joshua;Perfect!|Now, how about a game of dice?|It's quite simple. First, you-
speak;Seth;Joshua!|What are you doing?!|Get over here, now!
speak;Joshua;Uh oh...|The general's on my case... talk about bad luck.|Better get out while the getting's good!
